text: Yesli ty sprosish' ikh: "Kto sotvoril nebesa i zemlyu?" Oni nepremenno skazhut: "Bog". Skazhi: "Uzhe li dumayete, chto te, kotorykh, oprich' Boga, prizyvayete vy, yesli Bog zakhochet sdelat' mne chto-libo vrednoye, mogut udalit' ot menya etot vred? Ili, yesli On zakhochet yavit' ko mne milost', mogut ostanovit' milost' Yego?" Skazhi: "Bog yest' moye dovol'stvo: na Nego upovayut upovayushchiye
